1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6p.title: A Game of Thrones
1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6p.summary: The first book in the A Song of Ice and Fire series. Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne while dark forces stir beyond the Wall.

2b3c4d5e-6f7g-8h9i-0j1k-2l3m4n5o6p7q.title: Fire & Blood
2b3c4d5e-6f7g-8h9i-0j1k-2l3m4n5o6p7q.summary: A detailed history of House Targaryen from Aegon the Conqueror to the regency of Aegon III, full of dragons, wars, and political intrigue.

3c4d5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l-3m4n5o6p7q8r.title: The Winds of Winter
3c4d5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l-3m4n5o6p7q8r.summary: The anticipated next book in the A Song of Ice and Fire series, continuing the story of Westeros and its battle for the Iron Throne.
